Hi thanks for shopping with us . With interactive message templates, you make it easy for your customers to reply to a question or take a certain action. Rather than typing, all they need to do is to click on their desired answer. This ease gives them more incentive to respond. Using interactive templates allows for some predictability in your customer support chats. This may help you organize your team better, define processes, and even build automations based on how your customers interact with your messages.If you use an interactive message template to tell your customers about a new promotion and get them to claim a discount with a button, they are more likely to do so. You have a higher chance of making a sale when your recipient has less work to do, and can make a purchase or claim a discount with just one click. You can create an interactive message template from your WhatsApp Business account. If you use a customer communication platform like Rasayel, you can create a template from there too.

6)Provide the valid information in the fields and click on additional information dropdown.
7)Click on add button and observe.

A limited time offer (LTO) is a promotional deal or discount that is only available for a specific, short period, such as hours, days, or weeks, before it expires. This strategy uses principles of scarcity and urgency, creating a fear of missing out (FOMO) to encourage customers to make a purchase decision quickly rather than waiting. LTOs can include special pricing, free shipping, bonus gifts, or exclusive products, and are often used to drive impulse buying, boost sales, and clear inventory.
